scene.title: Dungeon
scene.text: Li Sushang had originally made up her mind to stay until late at night without making any noise.

motion.img: 素裳-欸真的吗-普通-近景

scene.dialog: Li Sushang:「……Will the plan go smoothly?」
scene.text: But before a single incense of time passed, she couldn’t help murmuring to herself, breaking the previous deal cleanly.
Thinking back, this whole deal was just a spur of the moment thing.
An hour ago, Li Sushang defeated the four guards of the Golden Sand Gang and interrogated them.
scene.dialog: Li Sushang:「……A hundred and thirteen people? Coming back tonight?

dialog.p: That's more than I expected, this might be bad…」
Li Sushang:「Hey, you know 「Eagle」 better than me…
say, if I want to fight him one on one, would he accept it?」

scene.text: He didn’t answer her question.

dialog.p: I’m Li Sushang, Eldest Disciple of『Wanderer’s House』.」
Don’t change the subject, you haven’t answered me yet.」
Man:「What are you saying… Wanderer’s House…

text.p: The man thought what the girl said was a bunch of crazy talk.
Li Sushang felt that she couldn’t communicate with this person at all, and simply ignored him.

dialog.p: Li Sushang: (Over a hundred people, should I do it by the rules? …Too troublesome.
The purpose of the trip is just to fight 「Eagle」.)

text.p: Her master had casually said [em color=#FAFAD2]「You know the Golden Sand Gang? Go beat their boss and come back.」[/em]
It was easy to say, but it gave her honest disciple a headache.

motion.img: 素裳-悲伤目下-普通-近景

scene.text: The girl sighed and tried to come up with a plan.
She was very inexperienced, and the only things she could draw inspiration from were stories she had heard from her father, mother, and the storyteller in the village.
「True Celestial」 Empyrea Phoenix……[\s] 「Willowfoil」 Lin Zhaoyu……[\s] 「Tireless Courser」 Ma Feima……

text.p: The names that shook the Jianghu Society appeared in her mind one by one, and then she eliminated them one by one.
These were all well-known experts, but they had never landed themselves in a predicament like her.
[em italic]Yan Shiluo……[/em][\s]
As if guided by a mysterious force, the strange Martial Arts legend from 40 years ago appeared in the girl’s mind.

scene.text: She had only heard the story once, but she remembered it unexpectedly and firmly:
『All the heroes of the Jianghu Society gathered at the Lotus Conference to discuss a plan to attack the Fire Cult.』

『Unexpectedly, the Fire Cult's holy leader, Yan Shiluo was lurking in disguise, and on the day of the conference he defeated the heads of three gathering sects Shao, Lian, and Hua, set fire to the Lotus Terrace, and went away laughing.』
Lurking in disguise…
The girl finally concocted a worthy plan.
Li Sushang's finger pressed lightly against the back of the man's head, extremely softly, but the person under her took a nervous breath.
scene.dialog: Li Sushang:「Hey, don't move, I won't kill you. I just want to make a deal with you.」
Man: [You crazy girl… you, what do you want to do?」
Li Sushang:「Your leader will be back soon. If you let him know that you were beaten like this by me, he will be furious and punish you severely, right?」
scene.text: The man didn't speak, and Sushang, taking his silence for agreement, went on happily.

dialog.p: Li Sushang:「I have a suggestion. Follow my plan and make sure he doesn't know anything.
Go and call your companions. Let's make an agreement first…」

scene.text: So, the girl「voluntarily」squatted in the Dark Dungeon.

『The Dark Dungeon』was originally the cellar of this inn. Since the Golden Sand Gang took over this place, its function hadn’t changed, except the stored items were replaced by living people instead of food.

The bandits’ looted「goods」were thrown into here, and a Baihui slave merchant would visit once a month, 'clean' the dungeon and leave the equivalent worth in gold and silver. For several years, the operation of this「Stop」had been very smooth.

text.p: But to sneak into the dungeon and pretend to be「goods」uninvited,
Li Sushang was probably the first one to do it.

scene.text: The dungeon was dark and damp, filled with a foul scent, with occasional low sobbing sounds from unknown cells, and occasional moments of silence.

text.p: Sushang spread out a makeshift mat with only a few withered weeds,
sat down properly, and recited the『Blade Mantra Swara』to pass time.

mono.p: The Blade Mantra Swara was the introductory mental method of『Edge of Taixuan』,
It was a unique skill highly coveted by everyone in the Jianghu Society.
But unbeknownst to most, the true body of the Blade Mantra Swara were just strange and inexplicable syllables.
The syllables were formless, they could not be described by words;
It taught neither Ki circulation, nor did it guide body training;
The so-called『Blade Mantra Swara』, was absolutely meaningless.
If you listened to the Blade Mantra Swara, you would treat it as the babble of an idiot in a dream.
It was impossible to think that this was the magnificent technique that reigned on top of the martial arts in Shenzhou for thousands of years.
As everyone knew, this was where mystery lay:
Recitation, meditation, and listening were training of the mind.

text.p: The words had power.
Sushang may not understand it, but she did feel the transformation of her『Heart』.

scene.text: With the reverberation of the words, the ups and downs of the rhythm, the Blade Mantra Swara seemed to seep through her blood, wandering through eight of her meridians.

text.p: Her body became lighter and lighter, her mind no longer stirred.
Her five senses converged into a single place, in a single Heart Lake.

scene.text: The lake was clear and transparent, a few melancholy leaves fell on the lake surface, yet they didn’t make a ripple.
The waves were calm, the water silent. The lake calmly reflected the existence of [Li Sushang].

text.p: This was the first out of the four stages of the Blade Mantra
-『Still Water』.
Sushang rid herself of trivial thoughts, transforming the Blade Mantra further.
Climbing the next level——
The Heart Lake condensed into ice,
Brushing away all irrelevant thoughts, without leaving a single trace.

scene.text: Second Stage -『Dustless』.

text.p: The cracks of the hard ice disappear without a trace,
and the Heart Lake became almost completely transparent, its light illuminating all creation.

scene.text: Third Stage -『Clear Mirror』
After ten years of training, this was the stage of the [Blade Mantra] that Li Sushang had cultivated.

text.p: But above this, there was the Blade Mantra’s highest stage…
Only her Master had reached the fourth stage in the world… that is…

scene.text: …………『Blade Sanction』…………

motion.img: 素裳-疲惫无神-抱手-近景

text.p: The ice surface suddenly shattered, the Heart Lake dispersed, and the Blade Mantra withdrew from her mind.
Li Sushang sat there blankly, with a splitting headache, and realized her back was drenched with cold sweat.

motion.img: 素裳-绝望张嘴-抱手-近景

scene.text: Ever since she reached『Clear Mirror』, Sushang couldn’t make further progress with her Blade Mantra.
Mother said that Master had been taught since she was two, she was the earliest one to get started, so her Blade Mantra stage was the highest.

text.p: But ever since Sushang was born, she had heard Mother chanting the Blade Mantra Swara day and night,
so shouldn’t ahe progress faster than Master?

motion.img: 素裳-悲伤目前-普通-近景

text.p: Master realized『Blade Sanction』when she was only thirteen,
and achieved『Eminence』at only fifteen.

motion.img: 素裳-悲伤目下-普通-近景

text.p: What about her? She was also fifteen…
She hadn't even fully cultivated『Blade Mantra』yet,
And had no clue on where to start with『Blade Sanction』.
Even after overcoming these two peaks,
There was still the essence of「Eminence」standing above them, shrouded by clouds, and wasn’t visibly real.

scene.text: Li Sushang froze, then suddenly smiled.

text.p: 『Emotions』were the enemy of the『heart』.
If emotions were allowed to create waves in the Heart Lake, Blade Mantra may be damaged.
Sushang knew this since she had a Clear Mirror heart.

dialog.p: Li Sushang:「Don’t worry, setbacks~ they are always there.
The top priority is to prepare for the sword trial!」

text.p: Li Sushang took out her cloth bag from the side.
According to the plan, the sword would be unsheathed tonight.
